description:
How to play guitar is an app that teaches beginning guitarists everything that they need to know about the guitar. It says everything from what a pickguard does to how to play a simple song using tabs.

This is a great app for anyone who would be interested in learning how to play the guitar.


Please leave a review!!!!!!!!!

New in version 1.1.3 -
 - Put a link in the chord chart section to link to my chord app.

New in version 1.1.2 -
 - Line that says to click on the TFG for more info on the startup screen
 - Links in the about page that take you to: an email to me, this website, and the app in the catalog to leave a review.
 - Reformat the links in the "How to Play" section to better suit the app theme

New in version 1.1.0 -
- "About" page when you tap the TFG logo on startup
- Menu titles
- New section: "How to Play"
- Chords section breaks down into "How to Play Chords" and the "Chord Chart"

New in version 1.0.3 -
  - Main menu changed a little
  - Back button changed
  - Fixed tuning sounds. Now all notes play together.
versionNote: Put a link in the chord chart section to link to my chord app.
